nodes.text: A Gloorag was a type of sentient species.

Gloorags were large creatures that resembled over-sized snakes. Their bodies had dozens of tendrils, eyestalks and respiratory stalks along them. This allowed them to carry out many different conversations at once, with each respiratory stalk able to engage in an independent conversation to the other ones. Emthuul was a Gloorag and he owned a bar called Emthuul's on Byrsym around the time of the formation of the Galactic Empire.
